name: eightpointnine
tag_list: coffee, personalisation, bespoke, customised, ecommerce, uk
overview:
eightpointnine is a UK based artisan coffee company which sells delicious fairtrade coffee to customers who want to create their own personalised blend of coffee beans from around the world via a series of sliding scales, adjusting levels of body from rich to light and flavours from fresh to spicy to suit.

For those who find it hard to make their minds up or need a little help to get going, eightpointnine also offer a grandCRU programme, which delivers a different hand-blended coffee each week.

eightpointnine operate a subscription service and offer deliveries at the start and/or the end of a week on either a weekly or a fortnightly basis. Additionally, customers can buy one-off boxes. Customers can choose to take advantage of the flexibility on offer and change their blend or pause their order so their coffee blend arrives when it suits them.

The main headquarters are in London and eightpointnine also have a production centre in the Cotswolds and a Scandinavian office in Trondheim. All eightpointnine employees are coffee disciples with most claiming to be addicted to the brown stuff! A passion for great coffee is at the heart of the company culture and is supported by regular cupping sessions and visits to some of the world’s bests producers and cafes.

All the coffee is blended and shipped from our Cotswold production centre in letter-box sized boxes. Inside the box is a small tasting card to give the customer an idea of what to expect from their chosen coffee blend and instructions on how best to enjoy it.
